mdRecord.dcterms:title: [Troops on parade, the Charles River and Castle Island]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Williams, Richard, active 1750-1776
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ink and watercolor manuscript view from Boston looking southeast towards Dorchester and Castle Island. Shows British soldiers and parts of the encampment and town.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Boston (Mass.)--History--Siege, 1775-1776--Maps--Early works to 1800
Boston (Mass.)--History--Revolution, 1775-1783--Maps--Early works to 1800
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Richard H. Brown Revolutionary War Map Collection
